comment: /**  * Get token from secure storage.  * @return null if a secure token doesn't exist and {@link LinkedInOAuthRequestFilter} must create one.  */
code: /**  * Get token from secure storage.  * @return null if a secure token doesn't exist and {@link LinkedInOAuthRequestFilter} must create one.  */ OAuthToken getOAuthToken().

comment: /**  * Save token to secure storage.  * Only called when {@link LinkedInOAuthRequestFilter} creates one.  * @param newToken  */
code: /**  * Save token to secure storage.  * Only called when {@link LinkedInOAuthRequestFilter} creates one.  * @param newToken  */ void saveOAuthToken(OAuthToken newToken).
